content:
at approximately  p.m. a male suspect in gray clothing robbed a female victim of her belongings by knifepoint at the intersection of Camino Corto and Abrego according to a campus emergency alert PERIOD The suspect fled on foot in an unknown direction PERIOD

The Santa Barbara County Sheriffs Office is investigating the incident and anyone with information about the crime is encouraged to contact the UC Police Department at    or leave an anonymous tip on the Sherriffs Offices online tip line PERIOD
